entities.name: kraacher
entities.description: Kreacher is the house-elf who serves the Black family. He is bitter and resentful towards Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character of the story. He gives instructions to Kreacher.

entities.name: malfoy boy
entities.description: The Malfoy boy is a member of the Malfoy family and is mentioned as someone Kreacher would rather serve.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends. He is mentioned as someone who is okay for Kreacher to be around.

relationships.description: Harry gives instructions to Kreacher on how he wants him to behave.
